basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Rouzbeh Hatamy. Solution-driven front end lead adept at contributing to highly collaborative and Agile work environment and determining customer satisfaction. Proven experience delivering consumer-focused websites using frameworks like Node.js and React.js . Built products for desktop and mobile app users over 3+ years, meeting highest standard for modern web design, automation tests, user experience, best practices and Scrum. Designed and developed web applications across multiple REST APIs.

projects.title: BizPay
projects.description: A payment assistant application for the Biz company. Biz is a network marketing company working with more than half a million marketers. This application made payment processing 60% faster by providing bank terminals and local wallets.

projects.title: BisFlow
projects.description: A consultancy application made for a Swedish startup. Multi-company dashboard for businesses with employees working hourly at different companies. This is a large scale project with a lot of third-party integrations, such as Stripe.

projects.title: MedClerX
projects.description: A medical startup launched in CA,USA. A PWA mobile app and a dashboard panel for sharing patients' data between medical departments. This startup is launched and funded by the United States Department of Health and Human Services.
